community.title: Community
community.description:
Ask questions, get help, or discuss all things with fellow storage providers, developers and experts.

You will also have DM access to the CIDgravity team.

training.title: Training
training.bookCallWithExpert:
Leverage all capabilities of CIDgravity with a 30 minutes one-on-one training session with one of our experts.

We will answer all of your questions, assist in troubleshooting or simply provide a comprehensive demo of the product.
training.formDefaultMessage: Hi, my miner ID is … , I would like to discuss …

diagnosis.title: Diagnosis
diagnosis.description: Troubleshoot miner ability to receive storage deals and connectivity with CIDgravity

docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Miner configuration, API, FAQ, and more…
